name: Stone Bowl
description: Patrons, show some love...

name: Savings Jar
description: Watch your savings grow!

name: Piggy Bank
description: The more you save, the fatter he gets!

name: Cash Register
description: You'll be counting cash till your hand cramps

name: Reverie Register
description: I hear it can scan QR codes!

name: Pumpkin Tip Desk
description: Quickly take away the cod or they'll be eaten by the jack-o'-lantern.

name: Chimney Counter
description: Seems like it's bottomless.

name: Abacus Counter
description: This abacus has weathered many storms.

name: Seashell Counter
description: The pearl in the seashell has been replaced by cod.
series: Of Coconut Trees and the Sea Breeze

name: Cod under the Sun
description: It is said that excess cod will be taken away by a hot air balloon if it's not collected on time.

name: Cashier Cart
description: Keep your balance at all times.
specialRequirements: Could be won in the Bread Maker during Anniversary Event 2020

name: Celestial Scales
description: Absolute justice!

name: Precious Collection
description: Each and every cod deserves to be treasured.

name: Ghost Treasure Chest
description: The ghost cries loudly, 'This is my cod! Mine!'

name: Treasure Pot
description: The best method to attract wealth.

name: Ding Dong Counter
description: The sound of the chime is so therapeutic.

name: Treasure Cashier
description: We only accept treasures!

name: Nocturnal Tip Desk
description: Rests in the day, collects money at night.

name: Ice Crystal Tip Desk
description: A mysterious little tune plays when a tip is received.

name: Twisted Honeypot
description: The growing vines carry the honeypot higher and higher.

name: Dozing Dragon Treasure Trove
description: Hands off the cod! Unless you want a dragonling who got up on the wrong side of bed on your back.

name: Delicious Baskets of Bread
description: Take some of the delicious bread with you!

name: Magical Stars Counter
description: The little mouse will thank you if you put some cod inside.

name: Jade Dragon's Treasure Cabinet
description: The tiny dragon stores all of its precious treasures here.
specialRequirements: Sold During Chinese New Year Event

name: Mysterious Droplets
description: Every drop is precious.
specialRequirements: Originally obtained from Deep-sea Ballad event

name: Aqua Tip Desk
description: Is it only time who likes the 'clickety-clack' sounds that the buttons on a cash register makes?

name: Clairvoyant Tip Desk
description: I can see the future. A windfall is coming your way.

name: Platform Tip Desk
description: Did this journey meet your expectations?

name: Festive Lantern Tip Desk
description: You can admire this exquisite lantern while you're tipping.
specialRequirements: Sold During Chinese New Year Event

name: Horizon Receiver
description: Signals received from across the cosmos have dyed the cod in the colors of the rainbow!

name: Birdy Jack-in-the-box
description: That's right, the kind birdy brought you an unexpected windfall.

name: Abundant Wings
description: Each feather is imbued with the magic of abundance.

name: Small Stump
description: A cozy table

name: Elegant Table
description: An elegant, impressive round table

name: Simple Carousel
description: At least it has a rotation function, but it has low efficiency.

name: Mechanical Carousel
description: Increases efficiency. Makes the meal enjoyable.

name: Modern Mechanical Carousel
description: A conveyor belt with added decorations. Maybe it'll put customers in a good mood!

name: Round Carousel
description: Slightly shortens the food's traveled distance.

name: Modern Round Carousel
description: Awesome! Be sure to maintain your image while eating.

name: Spiderwebbed Conveyor Belt
description: An old and spooky conveyor belt. Perhaps it can attract some special customers.

name: Mushroom Conveyor Belt
description: A cozy and mysterious conveyor belt. Friends can chat here all night long.

name: Marine Conveyor Belt
description: The pink octopus strictly monitors the quality of each meal.
series: Of Coconut Trees and the Sea Breeze

name: Fruity Conveyor Belt
description: The smell of fruits makes things more appetizing.

name: White Chocolate Conveyor Belt
description: Careful! It'll melt in high temperatures. Limited-time unlock: Jun 1st–Jun 30th.

name: Mechanical Conveyor Belt
description: It looks to be quite old. Green vines are climbing up the cold machinery.

name: Ghost Conveyor Belt
description: It squeaks when the belt turns.

name: Snowball Conveyor Belt
description: An exclusive set custom-made for Snowball. Limited-time unlock: Dec 6th–Jan 18th.

name: Sandalwood Conveyor Belt
description: You can smell the faint scent of the sandalwood.

name: Magical Celestial Conveyor Belt
description: A jingle can be heard every time the stars collide.

name: Elegant Moments Conveyor Belt
description: Oh, do mind your dining etiquette.

name: Furry Conveyor Belt
description: This conveyor belt will never shed! Requirement: Complete Aromatic Acorn 2-Star Judging.

name: Flowing Conveyor Belt
description: Let's drink and make merry, my friend. Limited-time unlock: Jan 4th–Feb 17th.

name: Four-Leaf Clover Conveyor Belt
description: Eating food blessed by four-leaf clovers is said to bring good luck. Limited-time unlock: May 17th–Jun 16th.

name: Cheesy Crunch
description: An appropriate amount of sweetness can enhance the flavor of food.

name: Magic Conveyor Belt
description: Rest assured that the magic spell is only used to transport things around on the belt. Requirement: Complete Aromatic Acorn 2-Star Judging. Originally obtained from Slumberous Nights event.

name: Bloody Night Feast
description: An invitation for midnight. Come attend this banquet!

name: Snowfield Dinner
description: Bury the drinks in a pile of snow for ten minutes and they'll taste even better! Limited-time unlock: Dec 6th–Jan 18th.

name: Imp's Conveyor Belt
description: I'm going to secretly devour your dishes!

name: Mint Chocolate Loop
description: Our table includes an endless loop of flowing chocolate!

name: Tidal Wave Conveyor Belt
description: The waves will carry delectable dishes to you. Requirement: Complete Aromatic Acorn 2-Star Judging. Originally obtained from Deep-sea Ballad event.

name: Halloween Memoirs
description: Let's have a blast tonight under the warm, orange light!

name: Warm Peaceful Fruit
description: No need to worry even if you're afraid of the cold! We've prepared some thick blankets! Limited-time unlock: Dec 6th–Jan 18th.

name: Butterfly Waltz
description: Little butterfly, little butterfly, why are you here? Obtained from Midsummer Birdsong event.

name: Gilded Conveyor Belt
description: Such magnificence! It is said to have been made by an accomplished craftsman.

name: Normal Gachapon
description: Has all kinds of capsules inside, but is not much different from the Gachapon machines available in the market.

name: Pink Gachapon
description: From beneath the pink gachapon green grasses grow. Very popular with girls.

name: Space SSR
description: I hear that someone received Animal Restaurant's best reward from this kind of Gachapon—a cat teaser bitten by Chef Gumi.

name: Retro Gachapon
description: Fashionistas have said that the most retro is the trendiest.

name: Lighthouse Gachapon
description: I want to touch the rounded roof!
series: Of Coconut Trees and the Sea Breeze

name: Banana Peel Capsule Machine
description: Even banana peels can bring you good luck!

name: Cotton Candy Gachapon
description: Please do not rock this machine. Limited-time unlock: Jun 1st–Jun 30th.

name: Lightbulb Gachapon
description: Why doesn't it light up?

name: Floating Spirit Gachapon
description: It's said that you can draw your desired reward after saying its name three times.

name: Sparkly Gachapon
description: They say if you pinch its nose, you'll have good luck! Limited-time unlock: Dec 6th–Jan 18th.

name: Wooden Gachapon
description: An expert made this by hand!

name: Gem Gachapon
description: Shiny yellow gems! Looks like something good is about to happen!

name: Between the Vines
description: There's treasure hidden in these vines!

name: Waggly Ears
description: It's trying its best to shake left and right for a surprise present for you! Requirement: Complete Aromatic Acorn 2-Star Judging.

name: Moonlit Universe
description: What secrets does the gourd of treasures hold? Limited-time unlock: Jan 4th–Feb 17th.

name: Nectar-Gathering Gachapon
description: Can you smell it? There's a floral scent coming from the capsules. Limited-time unlock: May 17th–Jun 16th.

name: Wispy Clouds
description: Please be gentle with the machine as it's soft and fluffy.

name: Wings of Blessing
description: Caress the wings before you turn the knob—Lady Luck may just smile upon you. Requirement: Complete Aromatic Acorn 2-Star Judging. Originally obtained from Slumberous Nights event.

name: Thorny Caged Bird
description: I wonder if the bird imprisoned in this also longs for freedom.

name: Snowman Gachapon
description: You're guaranteed to receive something fabulous! Try it now! The snowman hollered. Limited-time unlock: Dec 6th–Jan 18th.

name: Starry Butterfly Dreams
description: The butterfly points at the lucky capsules.

name: Oatmeal Shaved Ice
description: The soft and fluffy dog ears will bring you good luck!

name: Bubble Gachapon
description: Bloop, bloop, many treasures can be found inside. Requirement: Complete Aromatic Acorn 2-Star Judging. Originally obtained from Deep-sea Ballad event.

name: Gentleman of Hearts
description: A gentlemanly gachapon complete with a top hat, but then again, he secretly hides your capsules...

name: Lucky Sapling
description: If the little bird's gaze turns sharp, you're more likely to draw an amazing item! Limited-time unlock: Dec 6th–Jan 18th.

name: Floral Gachapon
description: Nurture these flowers well and they will shower you with endless fortune!

name: Rose Goddess
description: May lady luck always be shining upon you.

name: Hot Kettle Combo
description: Remember to drink more warm water!

name: Water Dispenser
description: There are plenty of paper cups beside it.

name: Cheerful Fountain
description: Lots of chubby animals like it!

name: Vending Machine
description: Make sure to put in exact change!

name: Mysterious Potion
description: We don't know when it appeared, but it seems the customers don't quite dare to try it.

name: Mushroom Beverage
description: You never know whether the next cup will be sweet or bitter.

name: Beach Impression
description: Has a limited supply of sweet coconut milk!
series: Of Coconut Trees and the Sea Breeze

name: Orange Juicer
description: One cup a day keeps the doctor away.

name: Spinning Teacup Drink
description: Be careful when you step on. The teacups spin.

name: Beep-beep Tea
description: Made by the robot Beep-beep.

name: Bloody Feast
description: It's sweet tomato juice!

name: Sleepy Bear Tea Table
description: Shhh! Don't wake it up!

name: Open-Air Lidded Bowl Tea
description: Remember to scrape the tea leaves before drinking.

name: Warm Summer Night Breeze
description: Brew a pot of tea and enjoy the breeze.

name: Sweetness Aplenty
description: Would you like it sweet, sweeter, or sweetest?

name: Afternoon Studio
description: Careful, don't accidentally drink the paintbrush-cleaning liquid like it's a beverage!

name: Ladies' Afternoon Tea
description: Let the exquisite afternoon tea set add a memorable moment to your life.

name: Seven Star Corner
description: Good medicine is bitter.

name: Floral Dew
description: An exclusive summer specialty drink brewed by the bees.

name: Sea Breeze Beverage
description: The refreshing cactus juice dispels the sweetness in the air.

name: Fantastical Drapes
description: Special drinks are sensitive to light, so they are kept covered by the drapes.
specialRequirements: Originally obtained from Slumberous Nights event

name: Night Drinking
description: The night is still young. Will you have a glass with me?

name: Free-flow Hot Tea
description: Have a cup of tea to warm your body!

name: Bottomless Refills
description: Fills up as much as you want!

name: Afternoon Sweet Wine
description: Just look at the daily recommendations on the blackboard if you aren't sure what to drink.

name: Magical Aromatic Tea
description: Drink it all up and you'll experience a surprising effect!

name: All-Night Drinking
description: Don't stop, never stop! We'll keep drinking until dawn!

name: Snowy Kotatsu
description: Serves a never-ending supply of warm drinks! However, be careful not to step on the slumbering birds!

name: Luxurious Tea Table
description: A variety of floral teas are placed upon it. The flowers used to make the teas are all homegrown and emit faint fragrances.

name: Courtly Tea Party
description: Let's enjoy some floral tea together after the ball.

name: Four Squared Wall Hangings
description: The logo of Gumi's Kitchen is drawn on all four squares.

name: Eternal Candle
description: This candle may be short, but it never goes out!

name: Paper Lanterns
description: Emits a gentle glow and lights up with Gumi's paw prints.

name: Classic Wall Lamps
description: Sometimes Gumi's Kitchen needs an antique feel too!

name: Witch's Broom
description: They say that on the broom lives friends that the witch met.

name: Reverie Wall Lamp
description: Shiny like a luminous pearl.

name: Message Bottle
description: A mystery person's letter has been stuffed inside.
series: Of Coconut Trees and the Sea Breeze

name: Grapes Chandelier
description: The little lights are made from crystallized grape juice.

name: Mango Neon Lighting
description: A light that gives off the fragrance of mangoes.

name: Lace Lightbulb
description: The light shines down on the green plants. They miss the sunlight.

name: Jingle-jangle
description: Lets out a melodious ring whenever it's touched.

name: Great Harvest
description: We don't have to worry about the food for winter anymore!

name: Classy Chandelier
description: It's beautiful but fragile. Please do not touch.

name: Morning Glory Hanging Basket
description: The flowers exude a faint fragrance.

name: Ice Cream
description: A favorite of both children and adults. The little shops of my childhood were just like this.

name: Sweet Memories
description: Automatic delivery that's fast and convenient!

name: Double Scoop
description: There are more than two flavors. Don't mistake it for a lottery!

name: Sweet Collection
description: All kinds of ice cream are available here!

name: Pumpkin Dessert
description: A pumpkin dessert made specially for Halloween.

name: Fantasy Dreamland
description: Descend into a fantasy dreamland for a chance to enjoy comforting and delicious ice cream.

name: Heartwarming Dessert
description: Various desserts made with love.

name: Handcart Sweets
description: 'This season, we recommend the sea salt ice cream!' said Mister Seagull.
series: Of Coconut Trees and the Sea Breeze

name: Fruit Ice Cream
description: Don't miss out! Step right up! There are many fruit flavors for you to choose from!

name: Relaxing Summer
description: Cones, popsicles, ice cream... Which do you prefer?

name: Automated Refills
description: It won't stop as long as it has the materials.

name: Magic Snowman
description: Get your snowman-made shaved ice! Limited to 100 servings a day!

name: Meow Desserts
description: Would you like to have some dessert after your meal?

name: Celestial Treasure Box
description: When the stars don't want to shine, they'll hide here.

name: Sweetheart Travels
description: There is ice cream brought back from various dessert planets inside!

name: Ladylike Character
description: One must always be elegant, even when eating ice cream!

name: Penguin Ice Spinner
description: One penguin, two penguins, three penguins... So many penguins!

name: Vernal Homecoming
description: Iced sweet dumplings have a rather different flavor to them.

name: Nectar Ice Cream
description: Uses an exclusive honey recipe. You can't find this anywhere else!

name: Cream Crisp
description: Pairing bread and ice cream is such a heavenly combiantion!

name: Sweet Baby Pram
description: How strange! All the ice cream flavors have a milky taste to them.
specialRequirements: Originally obtained from Slumberous Nights event

name: Icy Cross
description: The temperature of the room drastically falls the moment you open it.

name: Teddy Bear's Recommendation
description: Are you sure you don't want to try my latest innovation: mint chocolate ice cream?

name: Little Mouse Ice Cream Machine
description: Made by Little Mouse, a reliable brand.

name: Lightly Sweetened Cream Cone
description: How rich do you want the mint chocolate to be? You can customize it yourself!

name: Sea Salt Ice Cream
description: The unique sea salt flavor is sweet but not overly cloying.
specialRequirements: Originally obtained from Deep-sea Ballad event

name: Carousel Night
description: A carousel ice cream that never stops spinning and never stops serving!

name: Railway Train Shaved Ice
description: Made from a recipe that has been passed down through generations of the gingerbread family, this shaved ice will definitely tickle your tastebuds!

name: Birdie Ice Cream
description: A favorite among the birds!

name: Classic Taste
description: Made using a premium recipe that's fit for royals, you say? I'll definitely have to try it then!

name: Simple Wooden Doors
description: Be careful when you open and close them!

name: Solid Wooden Doors
description: Everyone says solid wood is good, but I don't know what solid wood is.

name: Glass Image
description: You can look through the glass and see what's behind the door.

name: Gumi's Custom Doors
description: Chef Gumi had an experienced artisan make it. It's so pretty!

name: Ribboned Door
description: Decorated with ribbons and full of festive cheer.

name: Mysterious Tree Hole
description: It leads to a mysterious wonderland.

name: White Lattice
description: Has a summer beach style.
series: Of Coconut Trees and the Sea Breeze

name: Strawberry Glass Door
description: Putting strawberry prints on a glass door is a refreshing idea.

name: Cookie Door
description: Please close the door lightly in case it crumbles.

name: Rusty Pipe Door
description: Made with old, discarded pipes. One man's trash is another man's treasure!

name: Jingle Bell
description: Each ring brings friends from afar.

name: Carved Wooden Door
description: Completely made by hand!

name: Pure White Memory
description: The impressions of time enhance its beauty.

name: Purple Mist
description: It feels like a beautiful dream with the gentle breeze blowing past.

name: Daisy Sliding Doors
description: There are pure white daisies blooming on the light green wooden doors.

name: Dreams of Jiangnan
description: Only in Jiangnan can one find such beautiful sights.

name: Floral Honeycomb
description: Only in Jiangnan can one find such beautiful sights.

name: Cheesy Impact
description: A mere door cannot stop the intense aroma of the bread.

name: Door of Serenity
description: It shuts out all the noise and voices that you'd rather not hear.
specialRequirements: Originally obtained from Slumberous Nights event

name: Summer Rose's Song
description: The flower strives to climb upward and touch the sapphire.

name: Winter Snowscape Door
description: Don't ask why you're able to view the snowscape from here, it's magic!

name: Chain Metal Door
description: A poster of 3HUA's newest show has been put up on it.

name: Soft Center White Chocolate
description: The puppy's bones will guard this place!

name: Deep-sea Door
description: It leads to a mysterious underwater world.
specialRequirements: Originally obtained from Deep-sea Ballad event

name: Spooky Tent
description: What's behind the curtains?! Wait, it doesn't look like there's anything?

name: Creamy Gingerbread Door
description: Please don't lick the door handle, kids! It's not edible!

name: Fluttering Silk
description: Lets out a rustling noise whenever the wind blows past it.

name: The Wild Swan's Door
description: Are you ready to uncover the story behind this door?
